titleStmt.title: A second sale of curious paintings far beyond the last, they being most originals; by the best masters. Viz. Tintoret. Van Dyck. Lilly. Paul Veroness. Blomart. Anthony More. Brower. Bots. Brugel. Young Frank. Backhowsen. Julio Romano. Percellus. Rembrant. Van Somer. Willebeck. Snyder. Larsileer. Hellemont. Villamena. Cornelius Johnson, &c. Will be sold by auction on Tuesday the 2d, Wednesday the 3d, and Thursday the 4th, of this instant December, 1690. next Bedford-Gate, in Covent-Garden. There will also be exposed to sale several rare tables and looking-glasses. The sale will begin at two of the clock in the afternoon. By John Bullord.
titleStmt.author: Bullord, John.

titleStmt.title: A second sale of curious paintings far beyond the last, they being most originals; by the best masters. Viz. Tintoret. Van Dyck. Lilly. Paul Veroness. Blomart. Anthony More. Brower. Will be sold by auction on Tuesday the 2d, Wednesday the 3d, and Thursday the 4th, of this instant December, 1690. next Bedford-Gate, in Covent-Garden. There will also be exposed to sale several rare tables and looking-glasses. The sale will begin at two of the clock in the afternoon. By John Bullord.

publicationStmt.publisher: Catalogues are distributed gratis, at Mr. Manship's at the Black Bull in Cornhil: Mr. Richard Parker's under the Piazza of the Royal Exchange: at the Marine Coffee-House in Birchin-lane: at Mr. Bullord's at the Old Black Bear in St. Paul's Church-yard: at Mr. Roper's next to the Devil Tavern, at Temple-Bar: at Mr. Not's in the Pall-Mall, booksellers; and at the place of sale.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
